text: Semiramis InterContinental Hotel is a skyscraper and hotel complex located in Garden City, Cairo, Egypt. The 32-story building completed in 1987, and houses an InterContinental hotel. The modernist building replaced the historic Semiramis hotel, and contains 726 rooms and suites, restaurants, bars, a cafe, outdoor Nile view terraces, a Spa, a gym, ballrooms, conference and meeting rooms, a shopping arcade and a casino. All rooms and suites boost spectacular Nile or Tahrir square views. ==See also== *Skyscraper design and construction *List of tallest buildings in Africa ==References== Category:1988 establishments in Egypt Category:Hotels in Cairo Category:Hotel buildings completed in 1987 Category:Hotels established in 1988
title: Semiramis InterContinental Hotel
